channel.title: UK irl meeting at Mopman's house
channel.description:
The British #mopar people should have a meeting in real life. I suggest Mopman's house as a venue because he otherwise wouldn't be able to show up.
We could all chip in for a hooker while we're at it.

item.title: UK irl meeting at Mopman's house
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:52, topic:501412”][quote author=Phillipé link=topic=619639.msg4436227#msg4436227 date=1405136148]

I laughed at “good things” when referring to a rrc.

ehehe

stfu halfrauds audio fitter.

This is just wrong.

I’m much more.

I’M CITY AND GUILDS LEVEL 3 QUALIFIED AND FOR SOME REASON ALSO CYTECH TRAINED.
[/quote]

Okay, so…

You’re just a little bit more than a halfrauds audio fitter

YOU BUILD THEIR BICYCLES AS WELL. :eek: :eek: :eek:[/quote]
he finishes projects

Read full topic
